00012 void CalibPlugin::drawFrame()
00013 {
00014     // calibration code -- no trivial painting done of num x num random rectangles
00015     const float meanintensity = 0.5f, variance = 0.05f;
00016     const int num = 1;
00017 
00018     int w = width(), h = height(), x = 0, y = 0, xincr = w/num, yincr = h/num;
00019     for (;;) {
00020         glColor3f( meanintensity + ran1Gen.range(-variance,variance), meanintensity + ran1Gen.range(-variance,variance), meanintensity + ran1Gen.range(-variance,variance) );
00021         glRecti( x, y, x+xincr, y+yincr );
00022         if ( (x += xincr) + xincr > w ) x = 0, y += yincr;
00023         if ( y + yincr > h ) break;
00024     }
00025     static const unsigned calibTot = 240;
00026     Debug() << "Frame " << frameNum << " fpsnow " << fps << " avg " << fpsAvg << " hwframe " << getHWFrameCount();
00027     if (frameNum >= calibTot) {
00028         stop();
00029         emit refreshRateCalibrated(static_cast<unsigned>(::round(fpsAvg)));
00030         emit finished();
00031     }
00032 }

00035 {
00036 #if 0
00037     if (!StimApp::instance()->busy()) {
00038         Error() << "Calib plugin can only be started once, at app initialization. Sorry!";
00039         return false;

00041 #endif
00042     wasDebugMode = StimApp::instance()->isDebugMode();
00043     StimApp::instance()->setDebugMode(false);  // force debug mode off to minimize console printing
00044     StimApp::lockMouseKeyboard();
00045     Log() << "Calib plugin locked mouse and keyboard to minimize paint events (please wait)";
00046     return true;
00047 }

00049 void CalibPlugin::cleanup()
00050 {
00051     StimApp::releaseMouseKeyboard();
00052     
00053     StimApp::instance()->setDebugMode(wasDebugMode);  // re-enable debug mode if it was set
00054     Log() << "Calib plugin released mouse and keyboard";
